Enum LogArchiveOptions

Used to select the types and attributes of log files returned.

Namespace: Figaro
Assembly: Figaro.dll
Syntax
[Flags]
public enum LogArchiveOptions
Remarks

This enumeration can be bitwise OR'd together with multiple values where it is used.

Fields

Name Description
AbsolutePathNames

All pathnames are returned as absolute pathnames, instead of relative to the database home directory.
Data

Return the database files that need to be archived in order to recover the database from catastrophic failure.

If any of the database files have not been accessed during the lifetime of the current log files, LogArchive(LogArchiveOptions) will not include them in this list. It is also possible that some of the files referred to by the log have since been deleted from the system.

The Data and Log flags are mutually exclusive.

Log

Return all the log filenames, regardless of whether or not they are in use. The Data and Log flags are mutually exclusive.
Remove

Remove log files that are no longer needed; no filenames are returned. Automatic log file removal is likely to make catastrophic recovery impossible.
See Also
LogArchive(LogArchiveOptions)
